    Pigeons!!!

    Who doesn’t like Columba Livia Forma Domestica

    History of Columba Livia Forma Domestica

    Candidate 1: London

    Considerably fat, not scared of people

    Candidate 2: Dubrovnik

    Pretty well fed, quite stupid

    Candidate 3: Hong Kong

    Very slim, extremely sensitive

    Candidate 4: Zagreb

    This particular one is pink which is funny; in general they are quite abundant

    Candidate 5: Ljubljana

    Quite stupid/calm as they don’t even notice my presence even though I was 5cm away; Quite fat

    Candidate 6: Split

    Captivated by the seagulls so didn’t take pics of pigeons… But watched youtube with 8 hrs of pigeons

    Credits: The picture from Dubrovnik is taken by Allison Lau, while other pictures are taken by me in 2022/2023. I would like to thank everyone for their inspirations, especially those in the slovenia/croatia trip. If you want me to feature your pigeon pictures please send me a message.
